Diagramming

Sep 9, 2020 â€¢ Christoph Kappel

TL;DR: Never found a good way to automate it; but nice tools.

While checking for ways to automate the creation of sequence diagrams I came across sequencediagram.org and really liked the ease of use and syntax.

Although the syntax is quite similar to the one of PlantUML, I really appreciate the idea to do just one thing in your browser. No client, no frills.

Another good one is: mingrammer/diagrams

I still lack a proper usecase, but the overall idea is nice and it is good to have a tool to chart cloud-based interaction.

Tagged as: tools, diagrams, sequence-diagram, cloud
